title: Positively Scary Arachnid - or - PSA
description: We've added a new level to our sponsorship rewards! Hear all about the details regarding becoming an Executive Producer of the podcast (yes, you can put that on your resume!) and gaining access to our new Haunted True Crime BonusCast. The first one is already available at Patreon! If you have the means, please consider donating at least $1 a month - that's cheaper than a cup of coffee! Not that I'm saying we're cheap...okay, so we might be...
